page.title: 08Moving House
page.content: My name is Amanda Frain.I live in Race Hill.But I used to live at Underlane which is inside our rectangle.We decided to move back into town because it was closer to St.Stephen's School.Previously my sister and I had a taxi to take us to and from school.The new house is better than the old one because there is more space.I like it where I live now because it is not such a long walk to town and all the facilities it provides.We decided to move back into the town because the countryside was less fun.We will,however,miss the countryside because of the quiteness,the animals that were there, and all of the farms we used to visit.
